title: No Fee!!! Gorgeous 2 Bedroom w/ Sun Room - High Ceilings - 9/1
posting_body: Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment at a well managed building in Brighton.
The apartment is 1 Block from Griggs St making for an easy commute anywhere on the green line.
The apartment is bright and airy, with high ceilings, plenty of windows and a gorgeous sun room off of the living room.
Tenants use the sun rooms for anything from office to storage.
They are a great addition to this lovely apartment.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
